bridge-type.label: JDBC Bridge
bridge-type.description: The JDBC bridge represents a connection to a JDBC 2.0 server. It's only possible to connect to supported database for which a driver is provided in the addon

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: Url
parameter.description: JDBC url to connecto to the database i.e. jdbc:mysql://localhost:33060/openhab

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to authenticate to the database

parameter.name: maxPoolSize
parameter.label: Maximum Connections
parameter.description: Maximum number of connections for the connection pool

parameter.name: minimumIdle
parameter.label: Minimum Idle Connections
parameter.description: Minimum number of connection that the pool will maintain idle to serve queries
